00039 abstract class Database
00040 {
00047   protected static $db  = null;
00048   
00054   protected $stmt       = null;
00055   
00056   
00062   protected $id         = 0;
00063   
00069   protected $datas      = array();
00070   
00076   protected $def_datas  = null;
00077   
00083   protected $table      = null;

00085   
00094   public static function getSingleton()
00095   {
00096     if (self::$db === null) {
00097       self::$db = self::getConnection();
00098     }
00099     
00100     return self::$db;
00101   }
00102   
00103   
00112   protected static function getConnection()
00113   {
00114     if (substr(DSN, 0, 5) === 'mysql') {
00115       $options = array(PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_INIT_COMMAND => 'SET NAMES \'UTF8\'');
00116     } else {
00117       $options = array();
00118     }
00119     
00120     if (DB_USER === null) {
00121       // SQLite
00122       $db = new PDO(DSN);
00123     } else {
00124       $db = new PDO(DSN, DB_USER, DB_PASS, $options);
00125     }
00126     
00127     return $db;
00128   }
00129   
00130   
00138   protected function initDatas()
00139   {
00140     $this->id = 0;
00141     
00142     $this->datas = array();
00143     
00144     foreach ($this->def_datas as $key => $value) {
00145       if ($value === PDO::PARAM_INT) {
00146         $this->datas[$key] = 0;
00147       } elseif ($value === PDO::PARAM_STR) {
00148         $this->datas[$key] = '';
00149       }
00150     }
00151   }
00152   
00153   
00163   protected function checkType($name, $value)
00164   {
00165     if (isset($this->def_datas[$name]) === false) {
00166       throw new Exception($name.' doesn\'t exist !');
00167     }
00168     
00169     $type = $this->def_datas[$name];
00170     
00171     switch ($type) {
00172       case PDO::PARAM_INT:
00173         if (is_numeric($value) === false) {
00174           throw new Exception('Wrong type : '.$name.' must be numeric');
00175         }
00176         return (int)$value;
00177       
00178       case PDO::PARAM_STR:
00179         if (is_string($value) === false) {
00180           throw new Exception('Wrong type : '.$name.' must be string');
00181         }
00182         return (string)$value;
00183         
00184       default:
00185         throw new Exception('Wrong type !');
00186     }
00187   }
00188   
00189   
00197   public function save()
00198   {
00199     if ($this->getId() === 0) {
00200       $sql = 'INSERT INTO';
00201     } else {
00202       $sql = 'UPDATE';
00203     }
00204     
00205     $sql = $this->prepareQuery($sql);
00206     
00207     if ($this->getId() === 0) {
00208       $this->stmt = self::getSingleton()->prepare($sql);
00209       $this->bind();
00210     } else {
00211       $sql .= ' WHERE id = :id';
00212       $this->stmt = self::getSingleton()->prepare($sql);
00213       $this->bind();
00214       $this->stmt->bindValue(':id', $this->getId(), PDO::PARAM_INT);
00215     }
00216     
00217     if ($this->stmt->execute() === true) {
00218       if ($this->getId() === 0) {
00219         $this->setId(self::getSingleton()->lastInsertId());
00220       }
00221       return $this;
00222     } else {
00223       return false;
00224     }
00225   }
00226   
00227   
00236   protected function prepareQuery($begin)
00237   {
00238     $sql = $begin.' '.$this->table;
00239     
00240     $sql .= ' SET ';
00241     
00242     $num_column = 0;
00243     foreach ($this->def_datas as $key => $value) {
00244       if ($num_column++ > 0) {
00245         $sql .= ', ';
00246       }
00247       
00248       $sql .= $key.' = :'.$key;
00249     }
00250     
00251     return $sql;
00252   }
00253   
00254   
00262   protected function bind()
00263   {
00264     foreach ($this->def_datas as $key => $value) {
00265       $this->stmt->bindValue(':'.$key, call_user_func(array($this, 'get'.self::getCamelCase($key)), $value));
00266     }
00267   }
00268   
00269   
00278   public function load($value)
00279   {
00280     if (is_numeric($value) === true) {
00281       return $this->loadById($value);
00282     } elseif (is_array($value) === true) {
00283       return $this->loadByArray($value);
00284     }
00285     
00286     throw new Exception('Impossible to load the data');
00287   }
00288   
00289   
00298   protected function loadByArray($values)
00299   {
00300     foreach ($this->def_datas as $key => $value) {
00301       if (isset($values[$key]) === false) {
00302         throw new Exception('Error in the data loading');
00303       }
00304       
00305       $this->datas[$key] = $values[$key];
00306     }
00307     
00308     $this->id = $values['id'];
00309     
00310     return $this;
00311   }
00312   
00313   
00322   protected function loadById($id)
00323   {
00324     if (is_numeric($id) === false) {
00325       throw new Exception('Wrong type for id : impossible to load !');
00326     }
00327     
00328     $sql = 'SELECT * FROM '.$this->table.' WHERE id = :id';
00329     
00330     $this->stmt = self::getSingleton()->prepare($sql);
00331     $this->stmt->bindValue(':id', $id, PDO::PARAM_INT);
00332     
00333     $this->stmt->execute();
00334     
00335     $result = $this->stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
00336     if ($result === false) {
00337       throw new Exception('Impossible to get the data !');
00338     }
00339     
00340     foreach ($this->def_datas as $key => $value) {
00341       $this->datas[$key] = $result[$key];
00342     }
00343     $this->id = $result['id'];
00344     
00345     return $this;
00346   }
00347   
00348   
00358   protected static function getCamelCase($column)
00359   {
00360     return ucwords(preg_replace("/(\_(.))/e", "strtoupper('\\2')", strtolower($column)));
00361   }
00362   
00363   
00373   protected static function revertUpperCamelCase($string)
00374   {
00375     if(empty($string) === true){
00376       return $string;
00377     }
00378 
00379     if(strlen($string) > 1) {
00380       $string = strtolower(substr($string, 0, 1)).substr($string, 1);
00381     }
00382 
00383     return preg_replace("/([A-Z])/e", "'_'.strtolower('\\1')", $string);
00384   }
00385   
00386   
00394   public function getId()
00395   {
00396     return $this->id;
00397   }
00398   
00399   
00408   public function setId($value)
00409   {
00410     if (is_numeric($value) === false) {
00411       throw new Exception('id must be numeric');
00412     }
00413     
00414     $this->id = (int)$value;
00415     
00416     return $this;
00417   }
00418   
00419   
00427   public function getTableName()
00428   {
00429     return $this->table;
00430   }
00431   
00432   
00442   public function __call($name, $arguments = array())
00443   {
00444     $prefix = substr($name, 0, 3);
00445     
00446     switch ($prefix) {
00447       case 'get':
00448         $name = self::revertUpperCamelCase(substr($name, 3));
00449         if (isset($this->datas[$name]) === false) {
00450           throw new RuntimeException('Fatal error : call to undefined method '.__CLASS__.'::'.$name);
00451         }
00452         
00453         return $this->datas[$name];
00454       
00455       case 'set':
00456         $name = self::revertUpperCamelCase(substr($name, 3));
00457         if (isset($this->datas[$name]) === false) {
00458           throw new RuntimeException('Fatal error : call to undefined method '.__CLASS__.'::'.$name);
00459         }
00460         
00461         if (count($arguments) !== 1) {
00462           throw new RuntimeException('Fatal error : call to undefined method '.__CLASS__.'::'.$name);
00463         }
00464         
00465         $this->datas[$name] = $this->checkType($name, $arguments[0]);
00466         return $this;
00467       
00468       default:
00469         throw new RuntimeException('Fatal error : call to undefined method '.__CLASS__.'::'.$name);
00470     }
00471   }
